reviewText: I have Scruples on VHS and visually going through the whole experienceof the movie is great.  Lindsay Wagner is a superb actress and you can'tgo wrong when she performs in a movie.  She also starred in 2 made for tv films, The Two Worlds of Jennie Logan and Burnout that I recorded ontoVHS - any idea on when these will be released on DVD?  Also, there's another execellent mini series - Bare Essence with Genie Francis and Linda Evans - any idea when this will be released on DVD?  There were a lot of great mini series made in the 80's that haven't made it to DVD yet.
Title: N/A
